name: We Are The Future
description:
**Feel free to check out the source repo at https://github.com/riceisnice/WeAreTheFuture**

Welcome to Team Green, a rag-tag group of kids who are rebelling against big businesses whose practices are threatening the very future of the planet. Play as Agent Toy-Box as you attempt to infiltrate a corporate hide-out and expose some rather unsavory practices. The future is yours to change, will you accept the mission? 

WASD to move, Q and E to switch between cameras, SPACE to drop Toys, CTRL to crouch (but you probably don't need to). Get to the green marker without being caught.

Made with Godot!

Credit:

AstroPippin-Code, art, animation

eglantine-Music
